name: DiverDeep
description:
DiverDeep is a small game my friends and I created for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam.

The diver is sinking to the bottom of the ocean and has limited oxygen. The sea creatures are aggressive and will cause the diver to lose oxygen if they collide.

Instructions:

  • Control the diver's fall using WASD.
  • Avoid colliding with any sea creatures.
  • Sink deeper and deeper until there are too many sea creatures to avoid.
